amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the Governor and legislature of the State of Washington approve any leasing of the Outer Continental Shelf off the coast of Washington State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-74 to require the Washington state Governor and legislature approve any leasing of the Outer Continental Shelf off of Washington state.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 256 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 256 (Roll no. 318).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
